response.overview: ShaSha, a nomadic actress from Chengdu, performs in Guiyang nightclubs while sharing a cramped room with fellow artists. Independent since her teens, she thrives in nocturnal routines—stage gigs, meals, sleep, occasional mahjong. Reuniting with model Butterfly sparks fleeting joy until misunderstandings rupture their bond. Yet ShaSha persists, embodying both "She" and "He" onstage and off.
response.title: Shasha
